sections.heading: in original language; English translation
sections.text: A record filed with a tribunal of this state under sections 42-748.01 to 42-748.13 must be in the original language and, if not in English, must be accompanied by an English translation.SourceLaws 2015, LB415, ยง 60.

42-748.13.Record in original language; English translation.

A record filed with a tribunal of this state under sections 42-748.01 to 42-748.13 must be in the original language and, if not in English, must be accompanied by an English translation.

SourceLaws 2015, LB415, ยง 60.
